entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
